name: CyPolice Heavy Officer - Yuu
text: During your Main Phase: You can send the top card of your Deck to your GY, then, if it is a "CyPolice" monster, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its original ATK. At the start of the Damage Step, if your "CyPolice" monster, except "CyPolice Heavy Officer - Yuu", battles (while this card is in the GY): You can banish 1 other "CyPolice" monster from your GY; Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only activate each effect of "CyPolice Heavy Officer - Yuu" once per turn.
